sentences: R. Sathyanarayana (9 May 1927 – 16 January 2020) was a musicologist and dance scholar from Mysore, India.
In 2018, Sathyanarayana received the Padma Shri civilian honour from the President of India for his contribution to the field of music.
Pundarikamala, Shruti: The Scalic Foundation, Suladis and Ugabhogas of Karnataka Music, and Karnataka Sangeetha Vahini were some of his notable works.
Karnataka Sangeetha Vahini (II rev. enlarged edn)
Bharatamuni Samman 2012 from Nalanda Dance Research Centre, Mumbai.
